biotools.summary: Predicts the transmembrane Beta barrel regions in a given protein sequence. The server uses a forked strategy for predicting residues which are in transmembrane beta barrel regions. Prediction can be done based only on neural networks or based on statistical learning technique - SVM or combination of two methods.

bioschemas.name: TBBpred
bioschemas.summary: Predicts the transmembrane Beta barrel regions in a given protein sequence. The server uses a forked strategy for predicting residues which are in transmembrane beta barrel regions. Prediction can be done based only on neural networks or based on statistical learning technique - SVM or combination of two methods.
